author: trawick
msg: tweak ap_get_remote_host() so that the caller can find out if she got
mod_access needed to know this, but the old code didn't handle IPv6

author: coar
msg: Bring forward the -V option for suexec from 1.3.20-dev.  It looks
like the umask() option needs to be brought forward, as well.

author: stoddard
msg: Fix a Windows seg fault on startup when multiple listen directives are being used.
The pool pointer in the local address field in apr_sock_t is not initialized until a
request is received.  in general, we should not rely on the addressed in apr_sock_t
when doing work on the listen_recs.

msg: These files are now obsoleted by ap_ebcdic.c

msg: > I've update the text files in os/tpf/samples, in part due to these ebcdic
